para: MinimumEntropy thresholding uses Li's Iterative Minimum Cross Entropy method. It is a wrapper around the &skimage; routine skimage.filters.threshold_li.

The algorithm adjusts the threshold iteratively until the change in one iteration is less than the given tolerance. If tolerance is set to &automatic;, iteration proceeds until the change is smaller than the minimum difference between intensities in the image.
The ℑ is first converted from color to grayscale if necessary.
